articles.description: Runner-up Jordan explained the simple but clever method used by camp mates when they wan't to keep conversations off TV
articles.content:
I'm a Celebrity.... Get Me Out of Here star Jordan North has shared the secret tactic he says his camp mates used when they wanted to make sure certain scenes wouldn't air.
 The ITV reality show run… [+1488 chars]
